name: EFM32 loader
tagline: CLI and GUI utility for EFM32's bootloader
body:
<center>![](https://github.com/cidadao/efm32_loader/raw/master/efm32_loader_winscr.png)</center>


### CLI mode usage
```
UART: efm32_loader.exe <port_name> <bin_file> uart <boot_pol>
USB:  efm32_loader.exe <port_name> <bin_file> usb
```

### GUI mode

Don't pass any arguments and the GUI will show up.


###Hardware connections (UART bootloader):
```
TX  -- BOOT_RX (E11)
RX  -- BOOT_TX (E10)
DTR -- BOOT_EN (DBG_SWCLK)
RTS -- RESET
```

### Other considerations:
In order to prevent the bootloader from being overwritten, the linkerscript must be modified as described on application note AN0003
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
